answers.answer: 28 weeks you start going every 2 weeks then starting 36 weeks you go weekly.
I was diagnosed with gestational diabetes and I go every three days for non stress test and ultra sound. I'm 32 weeks.
It depends on the dr. I started going in at 32 weeks bi weekly till 36 weeks then every week until delivery... Which ended up being at almost 42 weeks.
At 28 weeks I started making my 2 week appointments.
I'm 27+3 and from now on he said every two weeks

I guess it depends on the pregnancy or dr availability because throughout my whole pregnancy Ive had 1 appointment a month (I'm 34 weeks) and March I have 3 appointments scheduled because thats my due month.
At week I hit 28 weeks and now go every 2 weeks.
Seens I started going ... At 14 weeks my doc made go every 2 weeks , im 32 weeks now ... She said she will start to see me every week after 35 weeks ...
I have this appointment (25 weeks) and then one more 4 weekly at 29 weeks then at 31 I go to weekly appointments but I'm having twins.

question: When will your doctor start making you come in every two weeks? Just curious
